column2: "Moab ho atsɛmbusɛm. Ɔnam dɛ anadwe da kor na wɔasɛɛ Ar ntsi
column3: Moab abɔ; na anadwe da kor na wɔasɛɛ Kir ntsi
wɔkɔ nsorɔnsorɔmbea no do rukosu: Moab rutwa ewuo rutwa gu Nebo na Medeba do: hɔn nyinara hɔn etsifi apepa

column2: "Wofurafura eyitam wɔ abrɔn mu: hɔn adan etsifi
"Na Hesbon na Eleale rekeka mu; wɔtse hɔn ndze ara kodu Jahaz mpo: dɛm ntsi na Moab akofo rekeka mu dzendzen; ne kra ho him wɔ no mu."
"M'akoma keka mu ma Moab; n'ekunyin guan kɔ Zoar
column3: wɔkɔ Eglath-selisiya: na Luhit afowee no
column4: na wɔdze osu fow; na Horonaim kwan mu na wɔma ɔsɛɛ ewuotwa do."

column2: "Na Nimrim esu bɛyɛ kwawee: na sar no eguan
column4: na ha momon biara nnyi hɔ."
na wɔbɔsoa akɔ wɔdze bɔkɔ esukɔnndua no wora no ho."

column3: abɔ Moab he do aprɔw ehyia; na ewuotwa no du Eglaim

column2: "Na Dimon esu ayɛ bɔgya ma: na medze bi so bɛka Dimon ho
column3: ogyata bɔtɔ nyia ofi Moab boguan
column4: ɔnye asaase no do nkaa no do."
